root.name: disableStyle()

example.code: s = loadShape("bot.svg") s.disableStyle() shape(s, -30, 10, 80, 80) s.enableStyle() shape(s, 50, 10, 80, 80)

root.description: Disables the shape's style data and uses Processing's current styles. Styles include attributes such as colors, stroke weight, and stroke joints.

parameter.label: sh
parameter.description: PShape: any variable of type PShape
